title: Frontend React Developer - Contract position
description: Landed my first real web developer position.

bullets.heading: Current Job Stats
points: Worked on a frontend team to debug, code review and add features to a huge sports related ecommerce app with over 12,000 commits and tens of thousands of lines of code.
Frontend stack:  React, React Query,  Material UI, Typescript
Backend stack: PHP, Symfony, Twig, SQL
Dev env: Continuous integration with Docker, Webpack, JSLint, Cypress, GitLab

title: Frontend and Fullstack JavaScript Coordinator, Developer and Mentor
description: Promoted part time to full time, and from frontend to to the Full Stack JavaScript Techdegree.

bullets.heading: Current Job Stats
points: Collaboratively designed and created the software, programs, projects, and supporting material for the Front End and Full Stack JavaScript Techdegrees (online web dev bootcamps).
4,600+ frontend and fullstack student projects reviewed and evaluated.
Debugged thousands of projects and mentored hundreds of students with live, real-time online support.
Created and experimented with new programs to promote student success and increase conversion and retention rates.
Created, curated and documented team processes.
Reviewed, tracked and reported on analytics.
Help interview, hire and train new team members.
Use GitHub, Mode, JIRA, Confluence, AWS s3 and Zoom.

bullets.heading: Duties

title: Discovered that I could learn to code
description: Began studying front end web development and design. Signed up for Treehouse, Codecademy and Udacity.  Fell in love with programming.
